T02D3074:171b-0: @171b * // mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga la /
T02D3074:171b-1: las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D3074:171b-2: de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni stegs bu khru
T02D3074:171b-3: gang gru bzhi pa 'phang du yang khru gang ba
T02D3074:171b-4: zhig byas la / de'i grva bzhir yang de dang 'dra ba re re byas la /
T02D3074:171b-5: dbus kyi stegs bu gru bzhi dang mtha' ma'i stegs bu bzhi'i grva bzhi dang sbyar bar bya /
T02D3074:171b-6: de nas stegs bu dbu ma'i dbus su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'am //
T02D3074:171b-7: bcu gnyis pa cig bris te grva bzhi'i stegs bu'i
T02D3074:171b-8: dbus kyi padma 'dab ma grangs bcu drug pa zhig
T02D3074:171b-9: na ni / padma 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa bri /
T02D3074:171b-10: dbus kyi bcu gnyis pa zhig na ni /
T02D3074:171b-12: de'i dbus su mchod rten gzhag / mchod rten bzhag pa'i go rims ni /
T02D3074:171b-13: dang po dbus su bzhag nas /
T02D3074:171b-14: mtha' ma bzhi ni shar nas lhor bskor thabs su gzhag go //
T02D3074:171b-15: yang rnam pa gzhan du na dkyil 'khor grva ma sbyar bar phyogs bzhi ngos ngos sbyar te bya'o ;
T02D3074:171b-16: / grva bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lhung bzed re re spos chus bkang ste /
